alert.note: Alert for Debeque to Silt Corridor; Grand Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 08 at 1:45PM MST until November 09 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO NOON MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Grand Valley and Debeque to Silt Corridor. * WHEN...From 6 AM to noon MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.

area.areaDesc: Debeque to Silt Corridor; Grand Valley
